info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 7 at 10:46AM CDT until July 7 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
FFWSJT
The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Brown County in west central Texas... Northeastern McCulloch County in west central Texas... Northwestern San Saba County in west central Texas...
* Until 1245 PM CDT.
* At 1045 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 2 inches per hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Brownwood, Elm Grove, Brookesmith, Winchell, Mercury, Skeeterville, Camp Bowie, Placid, Zephyr, Indian Creek and Milburn.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 12:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 12:45 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Brown, TX; McCulloch, TX; San Saba, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 12:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 12:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Brown, TX; McCulloch, TX; San Saba, TX
